content.description: Sit start on a good side-pull edge on the right side of Botox Bloc that is fairly slabby. Move up into very thin crimps and fine footwork to top out.
content.location: Sit start four feet to the right of The Riddler on a good side-pull edge. Go straight up from there.

climbs.name: The Riddler
climbs.fa: Ricky Nash, Samuel Hayden After Holds Broke

content.description: Sit start on the obvious arete on Botox Bloc with your right hand on a half-circle feature and your left hand in a side pull under the overhang. Bump your left hand up to a sloper, then bump it higher to a better sloper. Get your feet right and then bring your right hand up to a crimp edge high up. Grab the top and top out.
content.location: Sit starts in the obvious arete on Botox Bloc.

content.description: Sit start around the left side of the arete and The Riddler on a small overhang. With a foot locked around the arete, move your left hand up to a good jug and then your right hand to a bad sloping vertical edge. With good feet, slap the top and top out on very bad holds.
content.location: Sit starts around the left side of the Botox Bloc arete and The Riddler on a good pinch edge.

content.description: A beautiful tan-colored chunk of rock to the left of the Bat Cave. There a couple of nice problems here.
